content.description: Start just under the lip, climb up to the three small knobs (the problems namesake). Climb up and over and follow a tricky slab up overtop.
content.location: On the bottom side of the world boulder, to the right of fertilizing daffodils

content.description: Start laying back on the sharp crimps. Find whatever feet you can and climb up. This problem is a drop off so after you get up to the ledge, hop back off.
content.location: From the start of the world boulder take the trail all the way around the boulder past trilogy. This is on the bottom right side of the boulder when you're looking at the world boulder from below.

content.description: Start low on the right end of the arete and climb up the nice holds on the overhanging face.
content.location: Right side of the uphill portion of the world boulder.

content.description: Start in the middle of this triangular boulder, head up and left.
content.location: Just down hill of the world boulder, opposite of razorback

content.description: One of the best in the area. Climb from under the huge bulge up and over. Compression at it's best!
content.location: From the top of the world boulder, continue down the right trail until you see the protruding bulge.

content.description: Climb up the obvious features in this boulder, start low!
content.location: From the Sacred Ruins trail turn left when you see the world boulder. This is on the center of the face to your right. Just to the left of Black.

content.description: A great compliment to it's partner (Fertilizing Daffodils). Start next to the tree and climb right and up over the slopey top.
content.location: From the top of the world boulder follow the trail right, past mercenary continue until you see the bulge sticking out.

content.description: Amazing problem, start on good holds low and climb up arrow head type feature. A big move to the lip guards the send.
content.location: From the Sacred Ruins trail turn left once you hit the world boulder and this is the first problem around the corner on the right.
